hymns.title: MWE BANTU BONSE BA PANSHI
hymns.content: All people that on earth do dwell

hymns.title: TWAMULUMBANYA MWE LESA
verses: Mwe Lesa Tata pe na pe;

hymns.title: WA MUSHILO WINE, LESA WA MAKA
verses: 1. Wa mushilo wine, Lesa wa maka!
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse, wa maka,
Bonse ba mu mulu bawa, baletila,
Wa mushilo ni mwe; mwabafye Kateka
Wa cine cine, no wa bulamba.
4. Wa mushilo wine, Lesa mu mulu,
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse na maka,

hymns.title: TUCINDIKE NO KWANGA
hymns.content: Let us with a gladsome mind

hymns.title: WE MUTIMA, ULUMBANYE
hymns.content: Praise my soul the King of Heaven

hymns.title: FIBUMBWA FYONSE FYA PANSHI
hymns.content: All creatures of our God and King

hymns.title: INDIMI SHINGI NDEFWAYA
hymns.content: O for a thousand tongues to sing

hymns.title: SUMBULENI IMITWE MWE!
hymns.content: Lift up your heads, ye gates

hymns.title: TULUMBANISHA MAKA YE
hymns.content: All hail the power of Jesu's Name

hymns.title: LUMBANYENI YESU UWATUUBULA
verses: Celeleni Yesu, mwe bali mu mulu,
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.

hymns.title: NATOTELWE LESA, WA MAKA YONSE
verses: Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe,
Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe,
Na ifwe twalyanga mu Mwana wakwe;
Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe,

hymns.title: NE SESE NE PENGA 'BENGI BALIKO
verses: Na mu cinso ca Mfumu baimbo lwimbo:
4. Twali fye mu mfifi, twali abasha,

hymns.title: PA BUSUMA BWA CALO
hymns.content: For the beauty of the earth

hymns.title: MWE LESA, KAFWA WA KALE
hymns.content: O God, our help in ages past

hymns.title: TATA WESU TULI PA NTANSHI PENU
verses: 1. Tata wesu tuli pa ntanshi penu;
3. Na 'ya menso yabe ya imwe Bene
6. Ne milomo yesu ibe ya Kristu,
Ilande pe luse lwakwe ku bantu.
7. Na 'ya matwi yabe yenu nshiku pe,
Tube fwe benu, mubili no m'tima.

hymns.title: LESA WANDI, LESA WANDI, MPUSUSHENI INE
verses: 1. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Wa kutemwa, wa cikuku, mpususheni ine.
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
M'lopa wakwe unsambishe ku kubifya kwandi.
3. Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Mfumu yandi, Mwine luse, pokeleni ine.
Lesa wandi, Lesa wandi, bakisheni ine
Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu Kristu,
Mbakisheni ku fya bubi, mbakisheni ine.

hymns.title: LESA EKACEMA WANDI
verses: Na mu ng'anda ya kwa Lesa,

hymns.title: MFUMU YA LUSE KACEMA
hymns.content: The King of love my Shepherd is
verses: No ko ndi e ko aba.
2. Ku menshi ya mweo na ko

hymns.title: BAKAKUMBA BAPEMPWILE
hymns.content: While Shepherds watched their flocks by night

hymns.title: LYAISHILE UBUSHIKU
hymns.content: It came upon the midnight clear

hymns.title: NI MU MUSHI WA KWA DABIDI
verses: 1. Ni mu mushi wa kwa Dabidi

hymns.title: AKAMUSHI BETLEHEME
verses: Mwe ntanda shonse sha mu mulu

hymns.title: KULI IFWE AFYALILWA
hymns.content: To us a Child of hope

hymns.title: IFYO BANTU BA KALE
hymns.content: As with gladness men of old

hymns.title: MWASHO BUFUMU
verses: E mo mube pe mu mwenu.
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.

hymns.title: LESA WESU ATEMENWE CALO
verses: Uyu Yesu, uyu Yesu ni Mfumu
Ya ku mulu, ya ku mulu na panshi

hymns.title: SHINA LYA YESU BUSUMA
hymns.content: How sweet the Name of Jesus sounds

hymns.title: YESU E KAAFWA WESU
hymns.content: What a Friend we have in Jesus

hymns.title: ISHIWI LYA MFUMU LILETI
verses: 1. Ishiwi lya Mfumu lileti, we fumye cili mu linso lyobe
Panuma walamona bwino mu linso lya mubiyo.
We munyina, we munyina, we fumye cili mu linso
Panuma walamona bwino mu linso lya mubiyo.
2. We kafinya balefumya cakutobola mu linso lyobe
Lyene walamona bwino mu linso lya mubiyo.
3.  Lingikeninmitima yenu ku muntu umo na umo

hymns.title: WE LUNKUBWA LWA FYUMA
verses: 1. We lunkumbwa lwa fyuma (nobe) watwala bengi mu fibi
Imicitile yabo (yonse) yapalana fye ne Ciwa.
2. Fwe balumendo na bakashana natucenjele ne fyuma,
3. Tupose fyonse tuli nafyo, lunkumbwa no bukowesho
Nga tukabe fibusa fyakwe, tukapyano mweo.
Lunkumbwa no bupupu (bwabo) e fyabatwele ku mfwa.
5. Ulu lwimbo twaimba (lelo) lukaba ni nte yesu,
Mwe baleibe fyuma fya bene mukapingulwa nafyo.
(Umuku wantashi, Kwimba no kutota; umuku wa cibili, belatota, kwimba fye te kutota.)

hymns.title: YESU ATUTEMWA BONSE
hymns.content: One there is above all others

hymns.title: KULI KAPILI ‘KUTALI
hymns.content: “There is a green hill far away

hymns.title: PA KULOLESHA LUPANDA
verses: Lwakulo luse e pamo ne palo

hymns.title: OWE, OWE MWE BANTU UMFWENI SHIWI
verses: 1. Owe, owe mwe bantu umfweni shiwi
Elya soswe lelo lyafika mu mitima
2. Owe, owe Kanshi ni pali ine
Pa bubi ubo ncita, ubo ncita.
Ndelila pa nkasa sha kwa Yesu,
Andubwile ne mubi, ndi mubi cine
No luse no kutemwa pali ifwe
5. We katula, Mulubushi, naisa kuli iwe,

hymns.title: TULETASHO WATUFWILA
hymns.content: “We sing the praise of Him who died”

hymns.title: BALONGANA ‘BABUFI BAPANGANA ‘KUMUTANIKA
verses: Imfwa ilya yali yesu, ukuti tube no mweo.
3. Pa capindama aibulilile emfwa ya bantu nse;
Ca cine kwali kushipa kwakwe kwalengele atufwile.
5. Muli wene icebo ca kutemwa casokoloka;
Tuli nankwe nomba, e katula uwatulwilile.
6. Bushe katula wa musango uyu tamulabe
Cine tutemwe Yesu, ifwe pana tulemutemwa.

hymns.title: PALYA PA LUPANDA MWE YESU AMFWILE
verses: 1. Palya pa lupanda mwe Yesu amfwile
Pa mutwe pali ngala, ngala ya myunga
2. Ku ninga e ku ninga Yesu abuka
Sekeleni bonse mwe Yesu wa bumi.
3.  Pa kunina ku mulu Yesu atile,
4.  Soseni ku fubusa na ku ba lupwa

hymns.title: KRISTU NASHUKUKE LELO
verses: Mwe ba panshi na ba m’mulu,

hymns.title: APWE PENGA LYA KWA LESA,
hymns.content: When the roll is called up yonder
verses: 1. Apwe penga lya kwa Lesa likomfwikwa mu calo,
Apo bukaca bwa lubuto tu tu,
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana pe shilya
2. Ubushiku bwa kutinya apwa bafwa bakema,
No kumono bukankala bwa kwa Kristu;
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana kwa Lesa,
Tuye landa ku bantu ifya mweo,
Nge milimo yapwa, ne fwe twaya mu calo cilia,

hymns.title: UWAFWIKILWE IMYUNGA
hymns.content: The head that once was crowned with thorns

hymns.title: MWISE, MUPASHI BULESA
verses: Mube ne fwe mu ngande yi,

hymns.title: MWE MUPU BULESA
hymns.content: Breathe on me breath of God

hymns.title: MWE MUPASHI WA KWA LESA
hymns.content: O Spirit of the living God

hymns.title: MWISE, TULI SHAMPOFU
hymns.content: Come to our poor nature's night

hymns.title: CIFULO TWATEMWA
hymns.content: We love the place O God

hymns.title: ULUCELO
hymns.content: New every Morning is the love

hymns.title: MWI SHINA LYA KWA YESU
hymns.content: Father, again in Jesus, Name we meet
verses: 1. Mwi shina lya kwa Yesu, Mwe Tata,
Ku luse lwenu mupe fya bupe;
Tuli fye no bulanda, mwe Tata,
Mu luse lwenu lwine lwa ntaka,

hymns.title: MWE LESA WANDI, MUBE NA INE
verses: 1. Mwe Lesa wandi, mube na ine;
Wa kwafwa ni mwe, mube na ine.
'Fya panshi fiya nge fya mu tulo;
3.  Mwali no luse kale kuli ne;
Na ku ntashi fi mube na ine,
5. Mwaba na ine te kuti ntine,
ne mfwa na maka ya bubi bwine
Ku mfwa, ku mweo, mube na ine.

hymns.title: BWA LELO BWAPWA, MWE KABUMBA
hymns.content: The day Thou gavest, Lord, is ended
verses: 3.  Ilyo ku calo na ku bemba,
Ku sha nko shone ne ndupwa

hymns.title: NI MWE KASUBA KA MWEO
hymns.content: Sun of my soul, Thou saviour dear

hymns.title: MUTUFUMYE NO BUPALO
hymns.content: Lord, dismiss us with thy blessing

hymns.title: LESA WANDI NATOTELA
hymns.content: Glory to Thee my God this night

hymns.title: MWE MFUMU TWALETA BANA
hymns.content: Our children, Lord, in faith and prayer

hymns.title: KATULA AISA KANA
hymns.content: A little child the Saviour came

hymns.title: BULENI UBWIKASHI
hymns.content: Take my life and let it be

hymns.title: MWE TATA MUBASUMINISHE BEMININE
verses: 1. Mwe tata mubasuminishe beminine pa ntanshi yenu,
Sumineni bapokeleleni, sumineni babe benu mu cine.
2.  Mwe Yesu aba bantu benu, Mwafwile pa kubalubula
Benu lelo, umfweni baleti twabika Imwe mu mitima yesu.
3.  Na imwe Mupashi washila, 'seni nomba mwikale nabo,
Bafweni ukwenda bwino, umutende wisule mu mitima yabo,
4.  Bacite milimo isuma, bapeleni bonse amaka,
'Kuti bende mubulungami basuke bafike kuli 'mwe ku mulu,
5.   Mwe tata mutashiwe, na Imwe Yesu, Mulubushi wesu,
Na imwe Mupashi mu basangulule Lesa umo fye acindikwe.

hymns.title: NI KUNO TWAMONANA, MWE MFUMU
hymns.content: Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face
verses: Kanwe na Imwe waini wa mulu;
3. E nshita ya kulyo no kulumba;
Ne mwe, mu nshite yi yawamisha
Shintu tukaba na sho kwa Yesu.

hymns.title: NI KATULA, PA MFWA YAKWE
verses: Ni katula, pa mfwa yakwe, abulile umukate ati,
Mwe buleni, mwe buleni umukate, umukate, mulye
E mulopa, e mulopa wasumine, wasumine imwe.
Imfwa yandi, imfwa yandi, ndemufwila, ndemufwila, bonse

hymns.title: YESU NI NTULO YA NSANSA
hymns.content: Jesus, Thou joy of loving hearts
verses: 5. Mwe Lesa mube ne fwe pe,

hymns.title: APO NDEILINGULULA 'NDI MUBEMBU
verses: Ine na maka yandi yeka yeka ndefilwa,
Pa kutuma Yesu abe cilubula candi.
Ingu mfwe ukutemwa kwena cine ndepola,
Pantu wen ni Mpalume ya bantu nse bonse
4. Nomba fwe bonse ilyo tucili pano;
Twibukishe mfwa yakwe no kubushiwa kwa kwe,
Ukunina kwa kwe, mpaka akasuke esa.
Kasuba ka kwe wene na bangeli,
Pantu ako kasuba ka kwe ka kupingula.

hymns.title: MWE LUSE LUTUNTULU NO LWA BUPE
hymns.content: O perfect love, all human thought transcending
verses: 1. Mwe Luse lutuntulu no lwa bupe,
Ku mweo, ku mfwa kwine, bafwane.

hymns.title: CINTU CAKUTUSUNGUSHA
hymns.content: It is a thing most wonderful

hymns.title: SEKELELENI! KALUBULA 'ISA
hymns.content: Rejoice and be glad! The Redeemer has come

hymns.title: MWE UMFWENI IMBIA NSUMA
verses: Ni kwi aya? Ni ku mulu!
Ni kwi aya? Ni ku mulu!
Ni kwi aya? Ni ku mulu!

hymns.title: BONSE NATULUMBE LESU WESU
hymns.content: Saviour, like a shepherd lead us

hymns.title: MWE KATULA MWINCILILA
hymns.content: Pass me not, O gentle Saviour

hymns.title: NOMBO KWISHIBA NAISHIBA
verses: Amfumya mu mfifi, na ku mfwa;

hymns.title: ONSE UTEMENWE! BOMFWE BONSE
verses: Bileni monse mu mpili ne nika;
Ne nshila ya mweo yene yabako:
Bileni monse mu mpili ne nika;
Bileni monse mu mpili ne nika;

hymns.title: MWISE KWA YESU, MWIKOKOLA
hymns.content: Come to the saviour, make no delay

hymns.title: KULYU BWITE BULEFUMA KWI SHILYA
verses: 3.  Icikuku ca kwa Yesu cice pe

hymns.title: TANDE NSHIKU SHONSE MBUTO SHA BUSUMA
hymns.content: Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness
verses: 1. Tande nshiku shonse mbuto sha busuma,
Tanda ku lucelo, na po kawa fye;
2.  Tanda ku kasuba na ku cintelelwe,
3.  Kanshi fwe balila, kanshi fwe banaka,

hymns.title: NA LIMBI 'IYO WE MUTIMA WANDI
verses: 1.  Na limbi lyo we mutima wandi,

hymns.title: KATULA UMO WINE
hymns.content: One offer of salvation to all the world

hymns.title: IMPONGOLO YAISUKA
hymns.content: There is a gate that stands ajar

hymns.title: BUSHE, IWE NAUNAKA
verses: Ba mu calo, ba mu mulu

hymns.title: BULE SHINA LYA KWA YESU
hymns.content: Take the Name of Jesus with you

hymns.title: UMFWA, WE MUTIMA WANDI
hymns.content: Hark my soul! it is the Lord

hymns.title: YA KWA YESU IMBILA
hymns.content: We have heard a joyful sound

hymns.title: BWELA,MWANA WALUBILE
hymns.content: Return, O wanderer to thy home

hymns.title: BWELA WE WALUBA, WE WANAKA
verses: Akupelyo umweo wa pe na pe.

hymns.title: MU BUSHIKU BWA BULANDA
hymns.content: Through the night of doubt and sorrow

hymns.title: MWIMININENI YESU!
hymns.content: Stand up! Stand up for Jesus

hymns.title: ILINTU MUTENDE ULEYA NA INE
verses: 2. Satana nga ntunka, ngo kwisa kweshiwa,
Te kuti ntine; mu mfwa nga mu mweo,

hymns.title: NDI WENU MFUMU, NALYUMFWA SHIWI
verses: Na ine nsoshanya ne mwe Lesa,

hymns.title: YESU NAMUTEMWA SHIKULU WANDI
verses: Katula wa luse, nkamwimbila fye pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,
No Kwimba  ningemba ne mfwa pa mpumi,
Na benu banino kuba ne mwe pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalilnga,

hymns.title: MWE MFUMU M NSOSHE, NSOSE
hymns.content: Lord speak to me that speak

hymns.title: MWE MFUMU, E CAWAMISHA
hymns.content: O Lord it is a blessed thing

hymns.title: PEPENI LESA MU MUSHILO WAYEMBA
hymns.content: O worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness
verses: Aleafwa no kubaka ku sha nkali,

hymns.title: MWE CENGE CA LUSE, NTUNGULUSHI
hymns.content: Lead, kindly Light, amid the encircling gloom
verses: Mwe Lesa, Ye! labeni sha kale.

hymns.title: MWISE NJAFWA, LESA M'KULU
hymns.content: Guide me, O Thou great Jehovah
verses: 3. Pa kufika ku m'longa wa mfwa,

hymns.title: WE MULENDO ULEYA KWI?
verses: Ni few bantu bene Yesu! Lindilila!

hymns.title: MU BULANDA BONSE UBO USANGA
verses: Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa!
Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa!
Losha menso kuli Kristu ku ntashi,
Ne fya ku mwabo uleo atangila.
Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa!
Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa!

hymns.title: MWE MFUMU NYENDE NA IMWE
hymns.content: “O Master, let me walk with Thee”

hymns.title: KU MINWE LESA NJIKATA
verses: 3. Mwe Tata, nyende pe ne mwe,

hymns.title: UMWEO MWAPELE
hymns.content: “ Thy life was given for me”

hymns.title: ESHA PE, USHILE, UMFWE KU MFUMU
verses: 1. Esha pe, ushile, Umfwe ku Mfumu;
Fwaye palo lyakwe, Ne cebo baka.
Wende nankwe pamo, Wiya pa natanshi:
E wasale nshila, E mweo wesu.
Enda no Mupashi, poke fya bupe,
E fyo uwaminwe, ku mweo wa pe.

hymns.title: TE KUTI NKANE YESU YO
hymns.content: “I’m not ashamed to own my Lord”
verses: Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,
Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,
Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,
Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,

hymns.title: TULIMA NO KUTANDA
hymns.content: We plough the fields and scatter

hymns.title: YEMWE, TUYEMFYA BANE
verses: Tulesefyo bwinga bwa Mwana wa Mpanga
E shibwinga wesu Mwana wa kwa Lesa,
Ilambo lya cine e mitima yesu,
E kutemwe kwesu kuli Tata wesu,
Twaipela kuli mwe tuli bantu benu.
Pa fifwalo fyesu, na pa filyo fyonse.
Na pa busuma bwa maluba yonse,
E ni Mfumu yesu, akateke calo,
Mwe fibumbwa fyonse fya mu calo conse.

hymns.title: LESA ABE NEMWE NSHIKU PE
hymns.content: God be with you till we meet again

hymns.title: TATA TWENDE NE MWE PE
hymns.content: Father lead me day by day

hymns.title: NDESEKELA TATA WA MU MULU
hymns.content: I am so glad that our father in heaven

hymns.title: YESU UWALI MU MULU
hymns.content: Jesus who lived above the sky
verses: Ku mulu ni ku kwisa fwa;

hymns.title: MUCITE MBE ULUBUTO
hymns.content: God make my life a little light

hymns.title: TATA TULEMUTOTELA
hymns.content: Father, we thank Thee for the night

hymns.title: MWE SHIFWE WA MU MULU
verses: Ukufwaya kwenu kucitwe panonse nga mu mulu
Mutulekele imisha yesu, ifyo na ifwe tulekela abatulile misha.
(Mutwelele milandu yesu, ngefyo na ifwe twelala abatubale imilandu).
Mwitutwala mukweshiwa, lelo mututule ku bubi.
Pantu ubufumu, na maka, no kucindama fyenu'

hymns.title: ISUBILO LYA BAPOSTOLI
verses: Nasubila muli Lesa, shifwe wa maka yonse
Na muli Yesu kristu, Umwana wakwe eka.
Uyo walengelwe no Mupashi wa mushilo;
Ubushiku bwalenga shitatu abushiwe ku bafwa;
Aikala ku kuboko kwa kulyo kwa kwa Lesa,
Ukufuma uko akesa pingula abomi na bafwa;
Nasubila mu Mupashi wa Mushilo, na mu
Lukuta lwa Mushilo ulwa bonse bene;

hymns.title: ISUBILO (LYA CILYE CA NIKESA A. D. 325)
verses: Nasubila muli Lesa umo, Shifwe wa maka yonse,
Ne fintu fyonse fyamoneka ne fishamoneka:
Na mu Mfumu imo Yesu Kristu, Mwana wafyalwa eka wa kwa Lesa.
Wafyalwa na Wishi pa ntanshi ya nshita shonse,
Lesa wine wine wa kuli Lesa wine wine,
Wa musango umo wine na Lesa Shifwe;
Muli uyo wine ifintu fyonse fyabumbilwe,
Uyo pali ifwe bantu, na pa bupususho bwesu, aikile ukufuma ku mulu,
No kufyalwa muli Mariya umushimbe na Mupashi wa Mushilo,
No kutanikwa pali ifwe kuli Pontio Pilato.
No kwikala ku kuboko kwa kulyo kwa kwa Lesa Shifwe.
Uko akesa kabinge no lulumbi ukupingula abomi na bafwa:
Kabili nasubila muli Mupashi wa Mushilo’
Uyo watula kuli Lesa Shifwe no Mwana,
Uyo atotelwa no kulumbwa pamo na Lesa Shifwe no Mwana,
Uyo asosele no tunwa twa bakasesema.
Lya mushilo, lya bonse bene, lya bapostolo bene,
Nasubila mu Lubatisho lumo fye lwa kufulunganya kwa mpulumushi,
Kabili no kulolela ukututubuka kwa bafwa,
No mweo wa cala ico cikesa.

hymns.title: AMASHIWI YE SHUKO (MATEO 5: 3-10)
verses: 1. balishuka ababusu mu mitima; pantu ubufumu bwa mu mulu bwabo.
4. balishuka abali ne nsala ne cilaka ca bulungami; pantu bene bakekuta.
5. balishuka aba luse; pantu bakabelelwo luse.
6. balishuka abasanguluke mitima; pantu baka mona Lesa.
7. balishuka abacito mutende; pantu baketwa abana ba kwa Lesa.
8. balishuka abalamatilwa pa mulandu wa bulungami; pantu ubufumu bwa mu mulu bwabo.

9. Muli abashuka ilyo bamupontela, no kumulamata, no kumwambo bufi icintu conse ca bubifi pa mulandu wa ine; sekeleleni no kwanga, pantu icilambu cenu cikalamba mu mulu; pantu e fyo balamete bakasesema ba ntanshi.
R Lembeni fye shuko, mu mitima, Mfumu.

hymns.title: LESA AKUPALE (IMPENDWA 6: 24-26)
verses: 2. Yehoba alenge icinso cakwe ukubutisha kuli iwe, no kukusenamina;
3. Yehoba enwine icinso cakwe kuli iwe, no kukupo mutende

hymns.title: ULWIMBO LWA KWA SIMEON (LUKA 2:29-32)
verses: 1. Nomba, we Mwine lubanda, muleke umusha wenu aye, aye umutende umwabele shiwi lyenu;
2. Pa kuti amenso yandi yamone pusukilo lyenu.
3. Ilyo mwapekanisha kuccinso ca bantu na ‘bantu.
4. ku kubo lubuto lwa kusokolwela Abena fyalo.
No bukata bwa bantu benu abena Israele.
Ululumbi lube Kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku Mwana, na ku Mupashi wa Mushilo:
Ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba
nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. Amen.

hymns.title: ULULUMBI (GLORIA IN EXCELSIS)
verses: 1. Ululumbi lube ku mulu kuli Lesa, no mu tende mu calo, ubusuma ku bantu.
3. Twamuletela ululumbi pa mulandu wa lulumbi lwenu lukalamba,
4. Mwe Mfumu Lesa, kateka wa ku mulu, Lesa Shifwe wa maka yonse.
5. Mwe Mfumu, Mwana wafyalwa eka Yesu Kristu;
6. Mwe Mfumu Lesa, Mwana wa mpanga wa kwa Lesa, wa kwa Lesa Shifwe,
7. Mwe bafumya imembu sha calo, mutubelel uluse
8. Mwe bafumya imembu sha calo, mutubelele uluse.
9. Mwe bafumya imembu sha calo, mupokele ipepo lyesu.
10. Mwe baikala ku kuboku kwa kulyo kwa kwa Lesa Shifwe mutubelele uluse.
11. Pantu Imwe mweka fye muli Mushilo; Imwe mweka fye muli Mfumu
Imwe mweka, mwe Kristu, pamo no Mupashi wa Mushilo, muli wa pa mulu mu lulumbi lwa kwa Lesa Shifwe. Amen

hymns.title: ULWIMBO LWA KWA MARIA (LUKA 1: 46-55)
verses: 2. No mweo wandi waangile Lesa Katula wandi;
3. Pantu alolesha pa bulanda bwa musha wakwe. Pantu, moneni, ukufuma kuli nomba aba nkulo shonse bakanumbulo washuka
4. Pantu Uwa maka ancitila fikalamba. Kabili lya mushilo ishina lyakwe.
5. No luse lwakwe lwa ku nkulo ne nkulo ku bamutina.
6. Acita ca maka ku kuboko kwakwe. Asalanganya aba miya mu kwelenganya kwa mitima yabo,
7. Abakata abesha pa fipuna fya bufumu, Na ‘balanda abasansabika,
8. Aba nsala abekusha fisuma, na ‘ba fyuma abafumyako iminwe mikutwa.
9. Ayatwa kalume wakwe Isreale, ukwibukisho kubelelo luse,
10. (Ifyo asosele ku fikolwe fyesu) kuli Abrahamu no bufyashi bwakwe, umuyayaya.
Ululumbi lube kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku Mwana, na ku Mupashi wa Mushilo.
Ifintu lwali mu butendeko: efyo lwaba na nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. Amen.

hymns.title: ULWIBO LWA KWA ZAKARIA (LUKA 1: 68-79)
verses: 1. Abe uwapalwa Lesa wa kwa Israele, Pa kuti napempula abantu bakwe, no kuba citile cilubula;
2. Kabili atwimikilo lusengo lwe pisukilo, Mu ng’anda ya mubomfi wakwe Dabidi-

3. Ifyo alandile kale umuyayaya mu tunwa twa ba mushilo, bakasesema bakwe; ku kututula ku balwani besu, Na ku maboko ya bonse abatupata; ku kucito luse ku fikolwe fyesu, no kwibukishe layano lwakwe lwa lya mushilo,
4. umulopa uo alapila kuli Abrahamu icikolwe cesu,
5. ukuti, pa kuba abapokololwa ku maboko ya balwani besu.
6. Atupele ukuba aba kumupyungila ukwabulo mwenso,
7. Mu mushilo na mu bulungami ku menso yakwe inshiku shesu shonse.
8. Awe na iwe, we mwana, uketwa kasesema wa Wapulamo; pantu ukatangilila ku cinso ca kwe Shikulu ku kupekanye nshila shakwe.
9. Ku kulanga bantu bakwe ukwishibe pusukilo Mu kulekelelwe membu shabo,
10. Pa mulandu wa luse lwa cikuku ulwa kwa Lesa wesu, umukesa tupempwilo kuca kwa mu mulu uwapulamo,
11. Ku kubalikila pa baikala mu mfifi na mu cinshingwa ca mfwa,
Ululumbi lube kuli Lesa Shifwe, na ku
Mwana, na ku Mupashi wa Mushilo.
Ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba na nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe.

hymns.title: TWAMULUMBANYA IMWE MWE LESA
verses: 1. Twamulumbanya Imwe, mwe Lesa: twasumina ukuti Imwe muli Mfumu.
2. Icalo conse cilemutotela: mwe shifwe wa pe na pe.
3. Bamutotela na bangeli bonse: ne myulu na ba make bonse abaikalamo.
4. Kuli Imwe Bacelubi na Baselafi: bemba no kuleka iyo.
5. Mwe Mushilo, Mwe Mushilo, Mwe Mushilo: Mfumu Lesa wa mabumba.
6. Umulu ne calo: fyaisula no lulumbi lwenu.
7. Bapostolo mu cilonganino caba ca kutasha: bamulumbanya Imwe.
8. Bakasesema mu kwafwana kwabo kwawamisha: bamulumbanya Imwe.
9. Bamufwilile mu mabumba yabo ayacindama: bamulumbanya Imwe
10. Eklesia lya mushilo mu fyalo fyonse: Iyasuminisha Imwe
11. Mwe Lesa Shifwe: mwe ba lulumbi lushakapwe:
12. No Mwana wenu wacindikwa wa cine uwafyelwe eka:
14. Imwe muli Mfumu ya lulumbi mwe Kristu:
15. Muleikalilila pe Umwana wa kwa Lesa Shifwe.
16. Ilintu mwaiminine kupususha abantu: tamwasulile fumo lya Mushimbe
17. Ilintu mwapwile ukwansho kucula kwa mfwa, mwabeswila bonse abasubila Bufumu bwa ku mulu.
18. Mwaikala ku kuboko kwa kulwo kwa kwa Lesa: mu lulumbi lwa kwa Shifwe.
19. Twasubila ukuti mukesa kabili ku kutupingula.
20. Eco twapapata mubafwe abatu benu: abo mwalubula no mulopa wabulo mutengo
21. Mubapende mu mulongo wa basalwa benu: mu lulumbi lya pen a pe.
22. Mwe Mfumu , mubapusushe abantu benu: no kupala ba bupyani bwenu
25. Kabinge twatotela Ishina lyenu mu nshita shonse pe na pe.
26. Twamupapata, mwe Mfumu: mutucinge lelo line ku mpulumushi.
27. Mwe Mfumu, mutubelele uluse, mutubelele uluse.
28. Mwe Mfumu, mutulangilile uluse lwenu,Ngefyo twacetekela muli Imwe:

hymns.title: KWAFYALILWE KULI FWE
hymns.content: Unto us a Son is Born

hymns.title: FWE BALENDO TWAFUMA KONSE KONSE
verses: 2.  Ni  ku maca e kumwesu fwe bantu
Mpepo yeka calo ca ku mwesu twakabila

hymns.title: KULI LESA TULETOTA
hymns.content: “Praise God from whom all blessings flow”
